backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profiles, financial loss calculations, legal defense generation, and gallery image storage with access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including financial calculator, legal defense generator, PDF export, dark mode UI, and dashboard with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing their purpose, from routing and authentication to UI components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode CSS variables for a warm, driver-optimized color palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Driver Defense Hub application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with TanStack Router setup, authentication flow, profile setup modal, and route definitions for dashboard, calculator, and legal defense pages.
frontend/src/components/CalculationHisto: Displays list of saved financial calculations with breakdown details and individual print-to-PDF buttons using native browser printing.
Renders structured legal defense document with sections for arguments, applicable laws, suggested steps, and print-to-PDF functionality.
frontend/src/components/DefenseHistory.t: Displays a collapsible list of previously generated legal defense documents with export-to-PDF functionality. Shows loading skeletons while fetching data and an empty state when no defenses exist.
frontend/src/components/FinancialCalcula: Form component for calculating financial losses from trips, accepting inputs for distance, fuel cost, tolls, maintenance, and fines. Displays calculation results and provides PDF export functionality.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main application layout with header, footer, and authentication-gated content area. Shows welcome message for unauthenticated users and renders children for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/LegalDefenseGene: Form component for generating legal defense documents by collecting incident details (date, location, violation type, circumstances). Displays generated defense using DefenseDocument component.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button that toggles between login and logout states using Internet Identity. Handles loading states and clears query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup, collecting name and email. Cannot be dismissed until profile is created.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on authentication state. Initializes access control with admin token and invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity storage, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, financial loss calculations, legal defenses, and dashboard data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for dark theme colors, accessibility-focused touch targets, and smooth transitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatorPage.tsx: Page component displaying the financial loss calculator form and calculation history with navigation back to dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page with hero section, action cards for calculator and legal defense tools, and recent activity displays for calculations and defenses.
frontend/src/pages/LegalDefensePage.tsx: Page component displaying the legal defense generator form and defense history with navigation back to dashboard.
frontend/src/utils/pdfExport.ts: Utility for creating printable HTML documents from financial breakdowns and legal defenses, opening them in new windows for PDF export via browser print.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended typography, container queries, animations, and dark mode support.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining a financial loss calculator and AI-powered legal defense generator for drivers with PDF export, dark mode UI, and dashboard features.
